page.title: 12Leisure:Worlds End
page.content: The area strongly lacks entertainment. Although it has three pubs, this is not sufficient for the under 16's because they are not allowed in! The council ought to build play parks with swings, roundabouts, slides,see-saws, and the like. Another idea would be to build a BMX track. This would attract boys and girls of all ages. The area also lacks shops and cafeterias, the parents could then go there whilst their children play in the parks. It should be evident that the area lacks entertainments for all ages.
